faqData.question: Can guests take photos or videos during the ceremony?
faqData.answer: You are kindly requested not to take or post any picture of the bride and groom anywhere and on social media because we already have our awesome photographers and videographers so you can enjoy this moment with us. Thank you.

faqData.question: What is the wedding theme and dress code?
faqData.answer:
Our wedding follows a strict dress code.

Dress Code: Strictly formal. No slippers, shorts, jeans, tshirt, or white color.

Colors: Brown, black, teal green, blue gray, or beige only.

We kindly ask all guests to adhere to the dress code to maintain a cohesive and elegant celebration.
